Blog.post: softball is over... i am kinda sad. i have no idea wat im going to do with all this time on my hands. i ran into rachel at jewel tonight and we talked for along time. which was cool. im going to tennesse soon like early monday morning we leave. i am so excited. this is gonna be too much fun. but i will miss jeff.
today is amonth for me and jeff!! ya... snaps for us!!!
